nodes.bodyText: These messages should have a '.' in the end of the sentence.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -151,6 +151,7 @@ messages:
     knight: '&a&oYour Talisman gave you 5 Seconds of Regeneration'
     whirlwind: '&a&oYour Talisman reflected the Projectile'
     wizard: '&a&oYour Talisman has given you a better Fortune Level but maybe also lowered some other Enchantment Levels'
+    hastier: '&a&oYour Talisman gave you haste'

nodes.bodyText:
@LinoxGH I followed the other talismans here, none of them had a . at the end.
I could update all of them though, if you'd like (if I do this, in this PR or make a new one for that?)

nodes.bodyText: But in other talismans it isn't see Talisman of Knight
Yeah I followed the other talisman and in there it is also capitalized
See Miner or Hunter Talisman then...
Either way, it should be lowercase.
For redundancy but foremost also for performance reasons, there should probably be a check first whether the Player already has a Haste effect running.
This check is done inside of the Talisman class, more specifically in the pass() method that gets called from within the checkFor() method

For performance/balancing reasons: Maybe only when an ore is mined and not for every block?
But then increase the chance to perhaps 45%?
You forgot to update the lore for the new chance
